Frituras de Cobo.name: Tamal Cubano en Hoja (Cuban Tamale in Corn Husk)
Frituras de Cobo.description: Corn based appetizer wrapped in corn husk, and filled with roast pork, on a bed of plantain chips

Frituras de Cobo.name: Alitas de Pollo (Chicken Wings)
Frituras de Cobo.description: Marinated fried chicken wings in garlic mojo sauce

Frituras de Cobo.name: Calamares Empanizados con Salsa de Sofrito (Breaded Calamari with Creole Sauce)
Frituras de Cobo.description: Crunchy fried squid served with tangy Creole sauce

Frituras de Cobo.name: Empanadas de Carne o Pollo (Beef or Chicken Empanadas)
Frituras de Cobo.description: Cuban turnovers filled with seasoned beef or chicken

Frituras de Cobo.name: Conga Combo Platter
Frituras de Cobo.description: A sampler platter of our favorite Cuban appetizers

Featured.name: Pepe’s Cuban Nachos
Featured.description: Homemade plantain chips topped w/Ropa Vieja, Picadillo, Guacamole, cheese, diced tomatoes, and onions

Featured.name: Camarones al Ajillo (Garlic Shrimp)
Featured.description: Shrimp sautéed in garlic, olive oil, lemon, and white wine

Featured.name: Antojitos (Cuban Snacks)
Featured.description: Fried cheese and chorizo over a bed of plantain chips

Featured.name: Tostones Rellenos (Stuffed Plantains)
Featured.description: Four stuffed green plantains, filled with Pork, Picadillo, Ropa Vieja, and Rice and Beans

Featured.name: Camarones de Coco (Coconut Shrimp)
Featured.description: Fried coconut shrimp served on a bed of plantain chips with Pepe’s homemade pineapple marmalade

Salads/Soups/Sides.note: Add to any salad (extra charge): Chicken, Garlic Shrimp, Steak

Salads.name: Lechuga y Tomate (Lettuce and Tomato Salad)

Featured.name: Meson Salad
Featured.description: Romaine lettuce, avocado (in season), tomatoes, cucumbers, shredded cheese, and onions

Featured.name: Caesar Salad
Featured.description: Romaine lettuce, shredded cheese, fresh croutons

Soups.name: Sopa del Dia (Soup of the Day)
Soups.description: Pepe's special soup of the day

Soups.name: Potage de Frijoles Negros (Black Bean Soup)
Soups.description: Cuban black bean soup w/onions and parsley

Soups.name: Sopa de Pollo con Fideos (Chicken Noodle Soup)

Sides.name: Arroz Blanco o Amarillo (White or Yellow Rice)
Yuca Hervida o Frita (Boiled or Fried Yucca)
Sides.description: Boiled or fried yucca with onion mojo sauce

Sides.name: Completa (Combo of Sides)
Sides.description: A combination of sides with your choice of: rice, black beans and sweet plantains or yucca

Featured.name: Cayo Hueso Cuban Mix
Featured.description: Key West's version of the traditional Cuban Sandwich, served with all the trimmings: sugar glazed ham, roast pork, Swiss cheese, pickles, lettuce, mustard, tomatoes & mayonnaise on crispy pressed Cuban bread

Featured.name: Pan con Bistec (Steak Sandwich)
Featured.description: Top prime sirloin steak sandwich with grilled onions, served with julienne potatoes, lettuce, and tomatoes

Featured.name: Emparedado de Pollo (Grilled Chicken Sandwich)
Featured.description: Mojo marinated, grilled chicken sandwich served with lettuce, mayonnaise, tomatoes and caramelized onions

Featured.name: Emparedado de Pescado (Fish Sandwich)
Featured.description: Breaded and deep fried fish served with lettuce, tomatoes and homemade tartar sauce

Featured.name: Pan con Ropa Vieja (Shredded Beef)
Featured.description: Shredded beef in tomato Creole sauce, served on Cuban bread

Featured.name: Pan con Lechon (Pork Sandwich)
Featured.description: Juicy Mojo - marinated roast Cuban pork served on Cuban bread, w/lettuce, tomatoes, and caramelized onions

Featured.name: Hamburguesa (Hamburger)
Featured.description: Hamburger American style - All sandwiches are served with your choice of French fries or plantain chips

Cuban Entrees.name: Ropa Vieja (Shredded Beef)
Cuban Entrees.description: Traditional Cuban shredded beef stewed with fresh tomatoes, green peppers, onions and red wine. Literally translated as "old clothes"

Cuban Entrees.name: Churrasco (Grilled Skirt Steak)
Cuban Entrees.description: Grilled skirt steak flavored with a tangy onion-garlic sauce

Cuban Entrees.name: Bistec Palomilla a la Plancha (Grilled Sirloin Steak)
Cuban Entrees.description: Grilled prime sirloin steak served with chopped onions and parsley

Cuban Entrees.name: Bistec Palomilla Empanizada (Breaded Sirloin Steak)
Cuban Entrees.description: Marinated and breaded top sirloin steak, fried and served with chopped onions and parsley

Cuban Entrees.name: Vaca Frita (Crispy Shredded Beef)
Cuban Entrees.description: Flank Meat shredded and grilled with garlic, lime and onions

Cuban Entrees.name: Pollo al Ajillo (Garlic Chicken)
Cuban Entrees.description: Half chicken marinated and roasted with garlic mojo glaze and caramelized onions

Cuban Entrees.name: Pechuga de Pollo a la Plancha (Grilled Chicken Breast)
Cuban Entrees.description: Breast of chicken grilled with parsley, olive oil and garlic adobo

Cuban Entrees.name: Lechon Asado (Roast Pork)
Cuban Entrees.description: Traditional Cuban roasted pork marinated in cumin-mojo sauce

Cuban Entrees.name: Chuletas de Cerdo (Pork Chops)
Cuban Entrees.description: Pork Chops marinated in lime and garlic, grilled to perfection and topped with sautéed onions

Cuban Entrees.name: Completa de Caballo Grande (Sampler Platter)
Cuban Entrees.description: Sample our 3 most popular Cuban dishes: Lechon Asado, Ropa Vieja, and Picadillo. A must-order if you're new to Cuban food.

Cuban Entrees.name: Completa Tradicional (Traditional Sampler)
Cuban Entrees.description: A traditional Cuban Combination of Lechon Asado and Tamel en hoja

Featured Entrees.name: Rabirubia Frita Entera (Whole Fried Yellowtail)
Featured Entrees.description: Fried whole yellowtail, marinated w/fresh key lime, garlic and onions

Featured Entrees.name: Filete de Cherna Empanizada (Breaded Grouper)
Featured Entrees.description: Grouper filet breaded and fried to perfection, served on a bed of lettuce and onions

Featured Entrees.name: Mahi Mahi con Salsa de Camarones (Mahi Mahi with Shrimp Sauce)
Featured Entrees.description: Fresh dolphin filet topped with a shrimp Cuban creole sauce

Featured Entrees.name: Pescado del Dia (Fish of the Day)
Featured Entrees.description: Pepe’s selection of fresh fish in a new creation each day

Featured Entrees.name: Zarzuela de Marisco (Seafood Medley)
Featured Entrees.description: A medley of seafood in a homemade Cuban Creole sauce

Featured Entrees.name: Camarones Empanizado (Breaded Shrimp)
Featured Entrees.description: Lightly breaded shrimp fried and served with a great mustard/garlic sauce

Featured Entrees.name: Camarones en Salsa Criolla (Shrimp in Creole Sauce)
Featured Entrees.description: Fresh shrimp in a homemade Cuban Creole sauce

Featured Entrees.name: Camarones al Ajillo (Garlic Shrimp)
Featured Entrees.description: Shrimp sautéed in garlic, olive oil, lemon, and white wine
